descriptionEn: 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, WC, Plot size 2000mp, Area size : 140 sqm, 2 Living Rooms, 2 Kitchens, Occupancy : 10-14 persons. A beautiful villa of 140 sqm is built in a plot of 2.000 sqm, just 500m from the beach. The property is located in Kassandra, 65 km from Thessaloniki Macedonia Airport and only 3klm away from the village. The house is divided into two independent levels, and can accommodate up to 14 people. In the first level there is a large living room (a/c unit) with a traditional fireplace, a dinner table, a double sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, three double bed bedrooms (a/c unit in each one), a shower bathroom and wc. In the second level there is a living room (a/c unit), a double sofa bed, a small kitchen, 2 bedrooms and a shower bathroom. The outside area has a big pool (12mX4.5m) with shalow place for kids, 30 sqm veranda, a big built BBQ and a lot of garden for parents and kids activities. The “traditional estate” is at the disposal of all interested parties throughout the year. At a low additional cost, car rental, airport transfer, with Luxury Van, as well as daily excursions to places you will give us. You can ask and take an offer to compare.
descriptionRo: 5 dormitoare, 2 băi, WC, teren de 2000 mp, suprafața casei: 140 mp, 2 livinguri, 2 bucătării, capacitate: 10–14 persoane. Contra unui cost suplimentar redus, se pot oferi servicii de închiriere auto, transfer de la/spre aeroport cu Van de lux, precum și excursii zilnice către destinațiile pe care ni le indicați. Puteți solicita o ofertă pentru comparație.

descriptionEn: Villa Veneti Suite – Probio – 80m² is a welcoming holiday home located less than 1 km from Nea Moudania Beach. It offers two comfortable bedrooms, one bathroom, and an open-space living room with a fully equipped kitchen including a refrigerator, coffee machine, and all essentials. The suite features a private balcony with city views, a terrace for relaxing outdoors, and modern amenities such as air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy easy access to hiking routes and local attractions, including the Anthropological Museum and Petralona Cave, located just 20 km away. Thessaloniki Airport is 51 km from the property. Ideal for families, couples, or small groups looking for a peaceful stay close to the seaside and town facilities.
